related-entities.name: aws_string_new_from_array::1::str->bytes
related-entities.comment: This is redundant, str->bytes is created from c_str which would be abstract at this point.

related-entities.name: aws_string_new_from_array::1::len
related-entities.comment1: This is redundant, len is created as strlen(c_str) which would be abstract at this point.
related-entities.comment2: len is actually an argument to this function.
